messages.title: I want to hear from you
messages.content: I’d like to talk to Tom. Please contact me. I’d like to vote Labour. Count me in! Yes, I’d like a poster. I am not currently displaying and would like to display a poster. Yes, I'd like to get involved in Tom’s local campaign. Please complete and return this form to: 268 Sutton Road, Southend on Sea, Essex SS2 5ET

messages.title: As your MP I will:
messages.content: Build Schools for the Future, Support Southend's airport, Back Labour's cancer care guarantee, Act on climate change, Be transparent with my expenses.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has acted to improve our public services. NHS investment has nearly trebled, schools are receiving much needed funds and pensioners are better off.
Labour responded to the global economic downturn choosing not to let the recession turn into crisis, unlike the Tories in the 80s and 90s.
Labour invests in people throughout their lives to help them get ahead in the economy, ready to seize global and green opportunities.
We believe that by working together we achieve more than we achieve alone. We want a community in which power, wealth and opportunity are in the hands of the many, not the few.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour came to power in 1997, we have been working to make your life better. We have saved the NHS, invested in schools and given families and older people a better standard of living. Although the Labour Government has invested in Southend, the Conservatives have opposed us and been wrong on all the issues. Don't let them!

issues.economy: Labour responded to the global economic downturn choosing not to let the recession turn into crisis.
issues.education: Build Schools for the Future. I'm proud for Labour's Building Schools for the Future Programme, rebuilding or refurbishing every secondary school in the country.
issues.environment: Act on climate change. Labour's Climate Change Act has made progress but there is much more to do in making homes energy efficient and increasing renewable power.
issues.governance: Be transparent with my expenses. You should know how your MP spends your money. I will publish details of all claims, however small, once a month.
issues.health: Back Labour's cancer care guarantee. Under Labour, if your doctor suspects you may have cancer, you will get the test and results that you need within a week.

contactInformation.address: 268 Sutton Road, Southend on Sea, Essex SS2 5ET

endorsements.endorsement: Tom is a good candidate and will be a strong MP for Southend West. I am impressed with the challenging jobs he's had and he's shown to be determined and not afraid to stand up for what's right, no matter who it upsets.

quotes.text: This election is a big choice about the future you want for Britain. The Tories threaten a change you can't afford. I am fighting for a future fair for all.
quotes.source: Gordon Brown, Leader of the Labour Party

images.caption: Elect Tom Flynn. Your Labour candidate for Southend West.
I want to hear from you
Southend deserves a stronger MP who will fight for our town.
